first_para: Ian Murray, MP (born 10 August 1976) is a Scottish Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament for Edinburgh South since 2010. He was previously an Edinburgh city councillor for the Liberton/Gilmerton ward.

full.extract:
Ian Murray, MP (born 10 August 1976) is a Scottish Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament for Edinburgh South since 2010. He was previously an Edinburgh city councillor for the Liberton/Gilmerton ward.
^ "Who's Who". Ukwhoswho.com. Retrieved 2013-07-06. 
^ "House of Commons - The Register of Members' Financial Interests - Part 2: Part 2". Publications.parliament.uk. Retrieved 2013-07-06. 
^ "Labour succeeds in Edinburgh South recount seat". BBC News. 2010-05-07. Retrieved 2013-07-06. 
^ "By-election result - City of Edinburgh Council". City of Edinburgh Council. Archived from the original on 28 May 2011.
full.title: Ian Murray (British politician)
